(Simplified: 缦)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 曼 indicates the sound; 糹 (silk) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 曼 [ màn ] long, extended, vast; beautiful
①沒有彩色花紋的絲織品。
②古同“慢”，不經心。
③(縵立)久立，如“縵縵遠視而望幸焉。”
④(縵縵)a。縈迴舒捲的樣子；b。沮喪的樣子。
⑤琴絃：操縵(撥弄琴絃，指學琴的人調絃聽音)。
(Simplified: 缦)

縵字的基本解释

縵
màn
见“缦”。

縵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［màn］
［《廣韻》莫半切，去换，明。］
［《廣韻》謨晏切，去諫，明。］
“缦1”的繁体字。
(1)无文饰的缯帛。
(2)泛指无文饰之物。
(3)杂乐。《礼记·学记》：“不學操縵，不能安弦。”郑玄注：“操縵，雜弄。”一说，缦谓琴瑟之弦。见《礼记·学记》陈澔集说。参见“縵樂”。
(4)见“縵縵”。
(5)通“慢”。舒缓；疏慢。
(6)通“幔”。
(7)通“漫”。

縵字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　縵； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页936第07
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?莫半切，音幔。【說文】繒無文也。漢律曰：賜衣者，縵表白裏。　又【周禮·春官·巾車】卿乗夏縵。【註】五采畫無瑑。【疏】言縵者，亦如縵帛無文章。【左傳·成五年】絳服乗縵。【註】車無文。　又【前漢·食貨志】一歲之收，常過縵田。【註】縵田，謂不爲甽者也。　又【廣韻】謨晏切【集韻】莫晏切，?音幔。【周禮·春官·磬師】敎縵樂。【註】縵，謂雜聲之和樂者也。【禮·學記】不學操縵，不能安弦。【註】操縵，雜弄弦屬。　又【莊子·齊物論】縵者，窖者，密者。【音義】縵，寛心也。【又】大恐縵縵。【音義】齊死生貌。　又【集韻】【韻會】?謨官切，音瞞。縵或作?。　又【韻補】叶莫半切，緩縵也。【舜卿雲歌】卿雲爛兮，糺縵縵兮。日月光華，旦復旦兮。

unadorned
Basic explanation of words
unadorned
màn
See "aman".
unadorned
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［màn］
["Guang Yun" don't cut it in half, change it, Ming. ]
["Guangyun" Mo Yan cut, go to admonish, Ming. ]
Traditional characters for "缦1".
(1) Ribbons without decorations.
(2) Generally refers to things without ornaments.
(3) Mixed music. "Book of Rites·Xueji": "If you don't learn how to play a man, you can't set up a string." Zheng Xuan's note: "Faman, jangong." In one word, Man called the string of qinse. See "Book of Rites·Xue Ji" Chen Xun's collection. See "Manle".
(4) See "manman".
(5) Through "slow". Soothing; slack.
(6) Through the "mantle".
(7) Through "man".
unadorned

[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　缦; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 936 No. 07
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Don't half-cut, sound mantle. [Speaking text] There is no text. The Han law said: The one who gives clothes, the man confessed.　[Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Towel Car] Qing took Xia Man. [Note] Wucai painting has no renewal. [Sparse] A man who speaks a man is like a man who has no articles. [Zuo Zhuan·Five Years of Success] Jiangfu Chengman. [Note] Che has no text.　[Previous Han·Shihuo Zhi] One-year-old harvest, often passing by Mantian. [Note] Man Tian means that he is not a stubborn person.　[Guangyun] Mo Yanqie【Jiyun】Mo Yanqie, sound mantle. 【Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Qing Shi】Educational music. [Note] Man is also called the harmony of noises. [Li·Xue Ji] If you don't learn to exercise, you can't settle down. [Note] Fuck a man, Zanon Xian belongs to.　[Zhuangzi·Qiwulun] The man, the pit, and the secret. [Sound and Meaning] A man, a heart. [Also] Great Fear. [Sound meaning] Qi is dead and alive.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui]? Moguan cuts, the sound is hidden. Man or make?.　【Rhyme Filling】Ye Mo half-cut, slowly. 【Shun Qing Yun Song】Qing Yun is rotten and awkward. The sun and the moon are bright, once Fudan comes.
